name: Hydraulic Lift Table Cart, 770Lbs Load Capacity 59 Inch Lifting Height, Manual Double Scissor Lift Table with Non-Slip Pad and 4 Wheels,Hydraulic Scissor Cart (770lbs-Double-Yellow)
short_description: Hydraulic Lift Efficiency: Features a robust hydraulic pump for smooth and precise lifting, enabling easy handling of heavy materials with minimal effort.
High Load Capacity: Supports up to 330 pounds, making it ideal for lifting and transporting heavy items safely and efficiently in various work environments.
Durable Construction: Made with thickened steel and a rust-resistant coating, ensuring long-lasting durability and stability during heavy-duty use.
Optimal Lift Height: Provides a maximum lift height of 28.5 inches, allowing for ergonomic loading and unloading to reduce strain and improve productivity.
Stable and Safe Design: Equipped with a non-slip pad and four sturdy wheels for enhanced stability and mobility, ensuring safe operation on different surfaces.
product_description: Hydraulic Lift Table Cart , designed to make your material handling tasks easier and more efficient. This robust lift table features a heavy-duty steel construction with a rust-resistant coating, ensuring long-lasting durability and stability during use. With a high lifting height of 28.5 inches, it allows you to raise and lower loads smoothly and safely using the manual single scissor hydraulic pump. Capable of supporting up to 330 pounds, this lift table is perfect for heavy load lifting and transport. The thickened steel platform provides a stable and secure surface, while the non-slip pad ensures your materials stay in place during movement. Equipped with four sturdy wheels, the cart offers excellent mobility, making it easy to maneuver in tight spaces or across different work areas. Whether you are in a warehouse, workshop, or industrial setting, this hydraulic scissor lift table cart is an essential tool for improving productivity and reducing strain. Its single shear lift mechanism guarantees smooth operation and reliable performance every time. Features : - Heavy-duty steel lift table with rust-resistant coating for enhanced durability - Manual single scissor hydraulic pump for smooth and controlled lifting - High lifting height of 28.5 inches to accommodate various tasks - 330-pound load capacity suitable for heavy materials - Thickened steel platform with non-slip pad for secure handling - Four wheels for easy mobility and transport - Stable and reliable single shear lift design Upgrade your material handling equipment with this durable and efficient Hydraulic Lift Table Cart, designed to deliver superior performance and ease of use in any demanding environment.

name: Hydraulic Lift Table Cart, 330lbs Capacity 49.6" Lifting Height, Double Scissor Lift Table with Non-Slip Pad & Safety Guard for Material Handling & Transportation, Yellow
short_description: Multiple Safety Features: Our hydraulic lift table cart is designed with multiple protective features. The handle-side safety guard and rubber non-slip pad prevent accidental falls, while the thick, chrome-plated handle offers a comfortable, secure grip without sharp edges. The overload protection rods and double-thickened scissor mechanism provide additional safeguards. Our scissor lift table cart is designed to prioritize your safety.

Heavy-Duty Hydraulic Pump: Engineered for durability, our upgraded hydraulic pump features high-quality seal to prevent leakage and ensure weight-lifting performance. The lift table smoothly raises loads up to 49.6'' and supports up to 330 lbs, making it the perfect solution for heavy lifting and high-reach tasks. Effortless operation means less strain and more efficiency for your workspace!

Flexible & Durable PU Wheels: Equipped with corrosion-resistant PU swivel wheels, this hydraulic lift table cart offers smooth 360° movement in any direction. Its easy maneuverability makes it ideal for seniors. The secure locking mechanism ensures stability, preventing any accidental movement and keeping the cart in place when needed.

Effortless Lifting & Controlled Descent: Simply step on the extended foot pedal to easily lift the table, reducing leg strain and enhancing comfort during use. Adjust the release handle to control the descent speed, allowing variability that suits your specific needs. This scissor lift table is the perfect alternative to manual lifting, saving you from the strain of lifting and improving your overall productivity.
Built to Last: The table and scissor mechanism of our hydraulic cart are made from durable carbon steel, providing high strength and long-lasting performance for heavy-duty tasks.
